A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Abysmal. I was disappointed in the weak characters\, Mary-sue super powers\, forced feminism and diversity of TFA\, but seeing a hero defiled and discarded was too much.

Look was a true hero. His life was hard\, he face opposition and adversity constantly\, but he never gave up. The force was not just given to him\, he had to earn it through punishing training and repeated tests and failures. He was strong willed\, morally good\, and he persevered.

Now he's gone\, and we have purple haired kamikaze dyk*s\, obnoxious affirmative action characters\, and one last Jedi who is the best just because of her genitals it seems.


I'm truly saddened by this.
